answers.answer: You need to go to your twenty week scan
You need to get the second trimester testing just in case there are issues with the pregnancy or you have diabetes or something like that.
I had test from 7 weeks and on.

Im 27 weeks now, i couldnt afford to go doctors from 14 weeks to 25 weeks and babywas fine actually every thing was looking great i have a scan today witch is the scan i was suppose to have at 20 weeks, what you should do is go to the doctor get your referal sent the doctor should write for you to be seen asap as its been ages since bubs been checked then ypur hospital app will start and ypu will get all test done and all, it is good to go as you never know even if bub is kicking, my bub kicks all day all night but its me that can have problems also that can cause harm to bub, my blood type is negative so im glad i went to doctors because i have tp get test just go as soon as you can hun
My doc doesn't start any tests until I'm 25 weeks. I've have my 20 ultrasound but if you don't get tested or anything till 25 weeks I'm sure it's fine

The testing doesn't matter as much as the anatomy scan ultrasound that they do at 20 weeks... It shows if everything is there and growing correctly on the baby, it'll show fluid levels, cervix length and many other important things... I was almost put on bed rest at 21 weeks because we found out my cervix was pretty short and I was at risk for pre-term labor and I would've never known if I wouldn't have had it. But everything besides that should be fine, just make sure around 26-30 weeks that you get a gestational diabetes test which is important for both you and baby!
I didn't have insurance til about 25 weeks and my baby is fine! Just make sure you're taking your vitamins and call someone if anything seems wrong, but do try to go as soon as you can!

question: hie im in my 21weeks and i havnt done any tests yet should i be worried, i  went for my first ultra sound scan at 11 weeks baby was ok . at th moment he is kicking non stop which at times makes me think he is safe.
title: 21 weeks and havent done any tests wat r the risks
